scripts.build: esbuild src/handler.ts --bundle --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/index.js && mkdir dist/native_modules && cp -r node_modules/sharp dist/native_modules/sharp/ && mkdir dist/node_modules && cp -r node_modules/semver dist/node_modules/semver/ && cp -r node_modules/detect-libc dist/node_modules/detect-libc/ && cp -r node_modules/color dist/node_modules/color/ && cp -r node_modules/color-string dist/node_modules/color-string/ && cp -r node_modules/color-name dist/node_modules/color-name/ && cp -r node_modules/color-convert dist/node_modules/color-convert/ && cp -r node_modules/simple-swizzle dist/node_modules/simple-swizzle/ && cp -r node_modules/is-arrayish dist/node_modules/is-arrayish/
scripts.prebuild:linux: rm -rf dist && npm uninstall sharp && npm install --arch=x64 --platform=linux --libc=glibc sharp
scripts.build:linux: esbuild src/handler.ts --bundle --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/index.js && mkdir dist/native_modules && cp -r node_modules/sharp dist/native_modules/sharp/ && mkdir dist/node_modules && cp -r node_modules/semver dist/node_modules/semver/ && cp -r node_modules/detect-libc dist/node_modules/detect-libc/ && cp -r node_modules/color dist/node_modules/color/ && cp -r node_modules/color-string dist/node_modules/color-string/ && cp -r node_modules/color-name dist/node_modules/color-name/ && cp -r node_modules/color-convert dist/node_modules/color-convert/ && cp -r node_modules/simple-swizzle dist/node_modules/simple-swizzle/ && cp -r node_modules/is-arrayish dist/node_modules/is-arrayish/
scripts.postbuild:linux: cd dist && zip -r index.zip * && cd .. && npm uninstall sharp && npm install sharp
